text:
Alejandro Padilla (; born March 22, 1973) is an American politician. He is the Junior U.S. Senator from California after replacing Vice President-elect Kamala Harris on January 20, 2021. He was elected the 32nd Secretary of State of California in January 2015.
Padilla is a member of the Democratic Party.
On December 22, 2020, Padilla was picked by Governor Gavin Newsom to replace Vice President-elect Harris in the United States Senate. Padilla is the first Hispanic Senator from California and the first male senator to represent the state since 1993.
